languages.text: {n}Сержант тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "На улицах наших блокпостов не осталось, все в руках повстанцев. Город {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}сдали почти весь{/d}, так что ждать подмоги неоткуда — кругом одни мятежники. И будьте осторожны — на улицах полно мин".

traits.locale_text: {n} Сержант тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Там сейчас из наших, видно, и не осталось почти никого. Город сдали почти весь, так что ждать подмоги неоткуда — кругом одни мятежники. И будьте осторожны — на улицах полно мин".

languages.text: {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}almost lost{/d}, so no help will come, we are surrounded by rebels. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."
languages.original_text: {n}Сержант тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "На улицах наших блокпостов не осталось, все в руках повстанцев. Город {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}сдали почти весь{/d}, так что ждать подмоги неоткуда — кругом одни мятежники. И будьте осторожны — на улицах полно мин".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is almost lost, so no help will come, it's rebels all around. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

{n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is almost lost, so no help will come, it's rebels all around. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

{n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is almost lost, so no help will come, we are surrounded by rebels. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

{n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is almost lost, so no help will come, we are surrounded by rebels. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

{n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is almost lost, so no help will come, we are surrounded by rebels. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

{n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is almost lost, so no help will come, we are surrounded by rebels. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

languages.text: {n}Der Sergeant seufzt schwert.{/n} "Alle unsere Straßensperren sind fort, alles ist in den Händen der Rebellen. Die Stadt ist {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}beinahe verloren{/d}, es wird also keine Hilfe kommen. Wir sind von Rebellen umgeben. Und passt auf, wo Ihr hintretet, {mf|Sir|Madam} – die Straßen sind voller Minen."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}almost lost{/d}, so no help will come, we are surrounded by rebels. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Sergeant seufzt schwert.{/n} "Alle unsere Straßensperren sind fort, alles ist in den Händen der Rebellen. Die Stadt ist beinahe verloren, es wird also keine Hilfe kommen. Wir sind von Rebellen umgeben. Und passt auf, wo Ihr hintretet, {mf|Sir|Madam} — die Straßen sind voller Minen."

languages.text: {n}Le sergent pousse un profond soupir.{/n} « Tous nos barrages ont été détruits, les rebelles tiennent tout le secteur. On a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}presque perdu{/d} la ville, et on ne peut plus recevoir d'aide... Les rebelles nous encerclent. Ah, et faites gaffe où vous mettez les pieds, les rues sont truffées de mines. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}almost lost{/d}, so no help will come, we are surrounded by rebels. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sergent pousse un profond soupir.{/n} « Tous nos barrages ont été détruits, les rebelles tiennent tout le secteur. On a presque perdu la ville, et on ne peut plus recevoir d'aide... Les rebelles nous encerclent. Ah, et faites gaffe où vous mettez les pieds, les rues sont truffées de mines. »

languages.text: {n}军士沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“我们所有的路障都毁了，整片区域都落入叛军之手。这座城市{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}基本失守{/d}，所以也没人能帮助我们，我们被叛军团团包围了。记得多当心脚下，长官，街上到处都是地雷。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}almost lost{/d}, so no help will come, we are surrounded by rebels. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

traits.locale_text: {n}军士沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“我们所有的路障都毁了，整片区域都落入叛军之手。这座城市基本失守，所以也没人能帮助我们，我们被叛军团团包围了。记得多当心脚下，长官，街上到处都是地雷。”

languages.text: {n}軍曹は深くため息をつく。{/n}「防壁は、すべて破壊されて、辺り一帯は反乱軍の手中です。街は、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}ほぼ失われ{/d}、助けは来ない。我々は反乱軍に包囲されている。足元にはお気を付けて。通りは地雷だらけですから」
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}almost lost{/d}, so no help will come, we are surrounded by rebels. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

traits.locale_text: {n}軍曹は深くため息をつく。{/n}「防壁は、すべて破壊されて、辺り一帯は反乱軍の手中です。街は、ほぼ失われ、助けは来ない。我々は反乱軍に包囲されている。足元にはお気を付けて。通りは地雷だらけですから」

languages.text: {n}El sargento suspira profundamente.{/n} «Todos nuestros puestos de control han caído; todo el lugar está en manos de los rebeldes. La ciudad está {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}casi perdida{/d}, así que no llegará ninguna ayuda. Estamos rodeados de rebeldes. Y cuidado donde pisa, las calles están repletas de minas».
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}almost lost{/d}, so no help will come, we are surrounded by rebels. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sargento suspira profundamente.{/n} «Todos nuestros puestos de control han caído, todo el lugar está en manos de los rebeldes. La ciudad está casi perdida, así que no llegará ninguna ayuda, estamos rodeados de rebeldes. Y cuidado donde pisa, las calles están repletas de minas».

languages.text: {n}Çavuş derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Tüm barikatlarımız yok oldu, bütün bölge isyancıların eline geçti. Şehir {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}düştü düşecek{/d}, yani yardım da gelmeyecek ve etrafımız isyancılarla çevrili. Ayrıca adımlarınıza dikkat edin efendim, sokaklar mayınla dolu."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant sighs heavily.{/n} "All of our roadblocks are gone, the whole place is in the rebels' hands. The city is {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}almost lost{/d}, so no help will come, we are surrounded by rebels. And watch your step, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the streets are chock-full of mines."

traits.locale_text: {n}Çavuş derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Tüm barikatlarımız yok oldu, bütün bölge isyancıların eline geçti. Şehir düştü düşecek, yani yardım da gelmeyecek ve etrafımız isyancılarla çevrili. Ayrıca adımlarınıza dikkat edin efendim, sokaklar mayınla dolu."

{n}Çavuş derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Tüm barikatlarımız yok oldu, bütün bölge isyancıların eline geçti. Şehir düştü düşecek, yani yardım da gelmeyecek ve etrafımız isyancılarla çevrili. Ayrıca adımlarınıza dikkat edin efendim, sokaklar mayınla dolu."
